text: Arau prthiraita ache paraspara sanlagna bhukhanda, angurara bagica, kheti pathara, eke'i mulara paraa udagata ba bhina bhina mulara paraa udagata khejura gacha yiboraka eke paniye'i jipala karae, kintu soraadara ksetrata se'iborara kichumanaka ami ana kichumanara oparata sraesthatba di'om. Niscaya bodhasakti sampanna sampradayara babe iyata ache nidarsana
